meanings.definition: In the same manner or way
meanings.sent1: She completed the puzzle in the same way as before.
meanings.sent2: They both nodded in agreement at the same time.
meanings.sent3: He danced to the music in the same silly way.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed in the same direction, never changing course.
